response.overview: Every knight-in-training needs their merry band of friends and Mike is no exception! Mike’s best friends are Sparkie and Squirt; a pair of friendly, funny and quirky dragons. In this collection of eight exciting adventures, Sparkie and Squirt summon their bravery and special skills to help Mike with his knightly missions: Investigating strange noises, facing monsters and camping in the great outdoors! No challenge is too great for this courageous trio… as long as they stick together.  8 Episodes included on this DVD:  1. The Dragon Squires  2. The Scary Noise  3. The Real Dragon  4. Sparkie's Amazing Thing  5. Squirt's Story  6. The Monster  7. The Special Sign  8. The Knightly Campout
response.title: Mike the Knight: Dragon Stories
